on reading compounds: 痒疹【ヨウシン】rash that accompanies a severe itch, prurigo
掻痒【ソウヨウ】itch, pruritus, amyctic, pruritic, itchy, irritating
麻姑掻痒【マコソウヨウ】things happening exactly as one pleases (wishes), someone being very attentive to one's wishes
kun reading compounds: 痒がる【かゆがる】to complain of itching, to be bothered by an itch (or rash, etc.), to feel itchy, to have an itch (or rash, etc.), to itch
かゆいところに手が届く【かゆいところにてがとどく】to be extremely thorough, focusing on even the finest of details
